title: Podcast Episode 142.1 – ROADSIDE ATTRACTION by Abby Knox
description:
Our audiobook this week is ROADSIDE ATTRACTION by Abby Knox

After escaping a bad marriage, Juniper is on the run. A little car trouble is to be expected on her cross-country road trip to nowhere in particular but breaking down and being stuck in a strange little town called Fate was not in the plan. Neither was meeting a surly tow truck driver/mechanic who arrived just in time. Rex is broody, bossy, and strong, and the connection between them is instantaneous. Putting down roots in Fate might seem simple, but it’s only a matter of time before Juniper’s complicated past catches up to her and brings with it a whole tangled mess of trouble.

eBook Roadside Attraction: https://amzn.to/2XkSgAp
Enter Giveaway: https://bit.ly/399htzS
